revised_title: Clarification on the Involvement of Mr. Busk and Dr. Carpenter in the Research on Annelid Reproductive Organs
tldr: Dr. Thomas Williams clarifies that he did not intend to implicate Mr. Busk and Dr. Carpenter in his views on the structure and homology of the reproductive organs of annelids, despite showing them his dissections and receiving what he believed to be their concurrence and approbation.
